content: Our company policy allows 20 days of paid vacation per year. Employees can carry over up to 5 unused days to the next year.
The IT helpdesk is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM. For urgent issues outside these hours, call the emergency hotline at ext. 911.
All expense reports must be submitted within 30 days of the expense date. Receipts are required for expenses over $50.
Our office is located at 123 Tech Street, Silicon Valley, CA. The main reception is on the 5th floor.
New employees must complete onboarding training within their first week. This includes security awareness, company culture, and role-specific training.
Remote work is allowed up to 3 days per week. Employees must coordinate with their team lead and update their calendar accordingly.
Health insurance enrollment must be completed within 30 days of your start date. The company covers 80% of the premium for employees and 50% for dependents.
All employees are required to complete annual security training and acknowledge the company's information security policy.
The company provides a 401(k) retirement plan with a 4% employer match. Employees are eligible to enroll after 90 days of employment.
Parking passes can be requested from the facilities team. Monthly parking is available in the adjacent parking structure.
